events.description: Displays a list of all events the client has recieved since it started.

help.description: Displays a list of commands or help for a specific command.

args.command: the command to search for help

invite.description: Provides a link to invite the bot to your server.

ping.description: Returns the difference in time between when the bot recieved a message from Discord and when it finished sending.

pong.description: Returns the ping of the last heartbeat between Discord and this shard.

shardinfo.description: Displays info about all shards in the bot.

usage.description: Shows how many times each command has been used. Type usage all to see all servers.
